target: Yes, I do. What would you like to know?
context: <user>  I need a train that leaves on wednesday after 12:30. <system>  I'm happy to help! Could you let me know where you would like to depart from and what your destination is? <user>  I am departing from birmingham new street and my destination is cambridge. <system>  I have 12 trains that leave after 12:30 that day. Did you want to leave at about 13:40? That train arrives at 16:23 and costs 75.10 pounds a ticket. <user>  Yes, thank you. <system>  All set! Your reference number is 9P2D9ORJ . <user>  I am also looking for a certain hotel in the area. It is called the Lovell Lodge. Do you have information on that? <system>
